description.value: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Create Forgery]{Create Forgery} as an exploration activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in Society.

source.value: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg
